services.title: Our Services
services.intro: We provide expert repair services for iPhones, Android devices, tablets, and laptops with fast turnaround and top quality.

iphone.title: iPhone Repair
iphone.description: Screen repair, battery replacement, water damage fix, and more for all iPhone models.

android.title: Android Repair
android.description: We fix screens, software, batteries, and components for major Android brands.

tablet.title: Tablet & Laptop Repair
tablet.description: Display issues, software problems, battery and hardware fixes for all devices.

planning.intro: At DIGICITY, we offer quick and convenient Passport Photography services tailored to your needs.
planning.cta: No long waits ‚Äî just book your appointment and get your photos done affordably and efficiently.

why.title: Why
why.description: Digicity offers fast, reliable repairs for phones, tablets, and computers. Since 2021, we‚Äôve become a trusted name, also providing accessories and refurbished devices.

rapid.title: RAPID SMARTPHONE REPAIRS
rapid.description: Our certified technicians fix most issues on-site ‚Äî often in under an hour. No appointment needed!

period.screens: Screens: aftermarket screens 6 months and OLED screens 12 months

includes.flicker: Screen flickering or other technical issues

excludes.drop: Device damaged due to drop or visible mechanical damage
excludes.thirdParty: Device repaired by a third party
excludes.dataLoss: Loss of files or data as a result of repair ‚Äì devices must always be backed up before repair
excludes.software: Software-related issues, or compatibility problems caused by manufacturer software updates
excludes.newDamage: New damages not related to the original repair
excludes.preExisting: Device already had damages when brought to service

repair.screenDesc: Cracked or shattered screen? We‚Äôll replace it with a top quality display that makes your phone look and feel brand new like it just came out of the box.
repair.batteryDesc: Is your battery draining quickly or failing to charge properly? We'll replace it with a brand new battery to keep your device running strong all day.
repair.backDesc: Cracked back glass? We‚Äôve got you. Premium parts. Clean finish. Good as new.

about.title: About Digicity
about.p1: Digicity was established in 2021 by Abdishakuur Mohamed Nuur, who recognized a clear market demand for professional phone repair services. His passion for mobile repairs began in his teenage years and has since evolved into a high-level professional skillset.
about.p2: At Digicity, we are committed to delivering fast, precise, and reliable repair services for mobile phones, tablets, and laptops. Our experienced team uses high-quality parts and modern equipment to restore your device as quickly as possible.
about.p3: With a focus on quality, transparent pricing, and customer satisfaction, we aim to provide a unique and trustworthy experience.
